body_html:
Guys,
I am still struggling to integrate the Estimator with Sequence data.
Can anyone provide a working demo code which I can refer which is using the sequence_feature_column ?

My doubt to be precise is that
in the sequence_input layer, it doesn't take sequence_numeric_column as is. It throws error that Input must be a SparseTensor.
Point to note is that it still accepts the sequence_categorical_column_with_vocabulary when I wrap it around normal feature_column.indicator_column

Help is appreciated !

Thanks

body:
Guys,
I am still struggling to integrate the Estimator with Sequence data.
Can anyone provide a working demo code which I can refer which is using the sequence_feature_column ?

My doubt to be precise is that
in the sequence_input layer, it doesn't take sequence_numeric_column as is. It throws error that Input must be a SparseTensor.
Point to note is that it still accepts the sequence_categorical_column_with_vocabulary when I wrap it around normal feature_column.indicator_column

Help is appreciated !

Thanks
